title: Storage stability, Nutritional profiling and consumer acceptability of Milk-sorghum based breakfast smoothie

This study was conducted to estimate the storage stability of Milk-sorghum based functional breakfast smoothie (MSBS). The product was packed in 200 ml glass bottles and stored at 4°C and...
